titleStmt.title: An enquiry, whether it be the interest of the city to insure houses from fire and whether the insured may expect any advantage thereby, more than from the Insurance-Office already setled.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Gentlemen of the Insurance Office on the Back-side of the Royal-Exchange, where the papers are to be had gratis,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Columbia University Library.
With: Observations on the proposals of the city, to insure houses in case of fire.
